name: Tap Chip Win
description:
This is a super addictive number puzzle
If you are a good player. Show us how good your skills are in other puzzle games!

How to play
1. Tap three identical numbers into one bigger number!
2. Make combos to get a higher score!

feature
1. Play to get rewards
2. Easy to learn but hard to master
3. A new type of brain training puzzle to entertain your brain for minutes or hours.

It can help your brain think!
Play games with your friends!


Exquisite game interface!
Simple and easy to play, a classic number game suitable for all ages!
Free installation!
Play without stress! Your game will be automatically saved.
